content:
Create a Work Plan

Available in: Lightning Experience with your standard Service Cloud license. Create a work plan from a work plan template with prescribed steps or without a template.

From a change request, click the dropdown and select Add Work Plans. Select a work plan template and click Add, or create a work plan without a template by selecting New.

Enter the information and save your changes. By default, the parent record is set to the current change request. To add work steps, click the dropdown next to the work plan and select Add Work Steps. Select the work steps you want to add and click Add. You can also add new work steps by going to the Related tab on the change request.

After adding work plans, you can see the outlined work steps from the record and mark the steps as complete as you go.
title: Creating a Work Plan in Service Cloud
